name: prayer factory
description:
use your mouse to draw and click buttons.
they say a wish come true is something akin to divine providence. that it's only for the worthy — better get to it then!

music: All that Stuff, by the dazzling @lucacrow | luca's kofi!!

sorry for the lack of a webGL build, the drawing recognition api stops working and i have yet to figure out what that's about?
